Name: Mysterious World
About the game: What kind of game is this? ' Mysterious World ' is a platform jumping game independently developed by individual developers. What is the main purpose of this game? This game is about a little girl who went out into the forest and was sucked into another world. In order to explore how to return to his own world, he went back to his own world through various difficulties. What is the content of the game? There are ten levels in this game, and each level has different experiences and surprises. The difficulty will increase as the game progresses. In the level, players need to continue to operate to avoid obstacles and overcome difficulties. The game is easy to use and simple to operate, and can create unlimited possibilities through simple operations.
